cloudCoding

Class UserProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • cloudCoding.UserProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UserProcess
extends java.lang.Thread
    An abstraction of a running process on the server. A UserProcess encapsulates the operating system's process, the process's I/O, as well as a separate Java thread containing a reference to the process. The UserProcess is created when a client requests that the server executes a program and maintains a continuous reference to the process so the client can make discrete requests to the server to be directed to this process.
    Author:
    Alex Brandt
